text: @narendramodi Hello sir, i want to give a suggestion for covid19. Announce a prize money for the district which will maintain its Covid19 case count to zero for 2 months. It will be a race to win for their district and win against the Covid19 war. @narendramodi ji hope it will help you🙏🏻🙏🏻
